import React from 'react'; import { KeySquare, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; const Instructions = ({ onContinue }) => { return (

How to Compare Movies

You'll be presented with two movies at a time. Simply choose the one you prefer.

{/* High Impact Matches */}

High Impact Comparisons

Watch for the amber dot - it indicates an important match that will significantly influence your final ranking.

{/* Keyboard Controls */}

Keyboard Controls

← 1

→ 2

); }; export default Instructions;
